name: Astar
text:
Whoa!
Nico, Kram, look!

name: Kram
text:
A-u!
Big, puddle?

name: Nico
text:
Hey, Kram.
That's called the sea.
I taught you that before, didn't I?

name: Nico
text:
Also, don't make too much noise.
If the people of this planet find us,
it'll be troublesome.

name: Nico
text:
It's late at night, so there probably isn't anyone around,
but there's always a chance.
If you understand, keep quiet, brats.

name: Kram
text:
A-u, understood!
The sea is amazing!!

name: Nico
text:
—You don't understand anything!
You're supposed to keep that excitement in your heart!

name: Astar
text:
Hehe, that's funny~.
Nico's voice is the loudest, though.

Some time had passed since I started
acting together with Nico and Kram.

Nico grumbled and complained, but
in the end, he still let us ride his "sleigh"
and showed us various sights.

—Trivial and insignificant,
days that could never return.

name: Astar
text:
...Even so, this area is incredibly warm.
It's completely different from the region
we were in yesterday.

name: Kram
text:
A-u-un!
Today, hot!

name: Nico
text:
Of course it is, right?
Listen, this planet, Earth's axis of rotation
seems to be tilted relative to its orbital plane.

name: Nico
text:
So, when the southern half gets closer to the star and gets hot,
the northern half gets cold. And vice versa.
Here, they call them "hemispheres".

name: Nico
text:
We were based in the cold northern hemisphere, far from the star.
Now we're in the southern hemisphere, directly opposite.

name: Nico
text:
—In other words, this planet has two
Christmases: a cold one and a hot one!
Did you learn something, brats?

name: Kram
text:
A-u?
Christmas, hot?

name: Astar
text:
Oh, really...? The temperature during Christmas
is completely different in the north and south.

name: Astar
text:
—In that case,
when we do "Santa" around here,
we'll have to do it differently!

name: Astar
text:
Because, in my usual outfit,
it would be too hot and I'd get exhausted.

name: Nico
text:
That's right.
If the day ever comes when our activities
extend to the Southern Hemisphere...

name: Nico
text:
We might need to pretend to be a summer Santa.
Well, that's still a long way off, though.
—And that day never came.

The local heroes gathered on Enoshima,
under the guidance of Saotome and Shiratori,
visited the beach located on the west side of the island.

And, under the pretext of "capturing
their natural enjoyment of Enoshima"
for calendar production—

The heroes, given some free time,
spent their time on the beach as they pleased.

name: Astar
text:
To think I would visit the sea
in such a way.

[Player], who was walking along the beach,
spoke to Astar, who was gazing at the horizon
while basking in the sea breeze.

options.text: Is this your first time at the sea?
Could it be that you've never tried swimming before?

name: Astar
text: Kyaaah!?

name: Astar
text:
Ah, it was you...!
Please don't reach out to me from behind.

Astar, who had shouted, took several deep breaths,
then answered [Player]'s question.

name: Astar
text:
...It's not my first time
coming to the sea.

name: Astar
text:
However, in the universe I came from,
the environment didn't allow me to visit the beach
in broad daylight.

name: Astar
text:
I just thought again that
it's quite different from the night sea.

Astar had a distant look in his eyes,
as if he was remembering something.

name: Astar
text:
When I walked on the beach at night in my
original universe, I never imagined that I would
get to visit the sea as a hero.

name: Astar
text:
Moreover, to be called a local hero
after crossing worlds, and to accept
a job here, who would have thought.

Astar, who said that, smiled faintly,
looking somewhat satisfied.

name: Astar
text:
...This, too,
must be thanks to you.

name: Astar
text:
"That time" too, and during Christmas,
you showed me a new world.

name: Astar
text:
And, the world you show me
is full of possibilities I don't know.

options.text: That's because you've worked hard, Astar.
I just helped you along the way, Astar.

name: Senthak
text:
Yo! You just said Christmas, right?
Did Astar-kun also meet [Player]-kun
during Christmas?

name: Astar
text:
P-pyan!!?
—Ehh, who is it this time!?

name: Astar
text:
...Hm?
You are, indeed...

name: Senthak
text:
Ah, I'm Senthak!
I'm a hologram creator!
And this is—

name: Alend
text:
—Alend, a city designer.
You're Astar, right?
It's a pleasure to meet you again.

The heroes exchanging greetings
shone brightly,
bathed in the beach's sunlight.

options.text: Now that I think about it, your swimsuit is nice, Astar!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Don't stare so much.
It's... hard to react.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No, it's...
It's not that I dislike it, but...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Senthak
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh!
As expected of you, [Player]-kun!
Your eye for detail is sharp!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Senthak
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Actually, this is also a 3D hologram!
I've hidden a small projector in my jacket, and it projects a translucent texture!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Senthak
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's a pretty avant-garde and cool idea, right!?
You can even touch it to check!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Alend
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It seems it was specially custom-made for this photoshoot.
To live up to expectations, I must deliver results and—

dialogue_after_selection.name: Alend
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No, wait, [Player].
What are you looking at?
Even if it's free time, we're still working, so do that later.

name: Astar
text:
Judging from your earlier words,
are you also involved in Christmas—
As "Santa"?

name: Senthak
text:
Hmm. Rather, the more accurate expression
might be "was involved in Christmas"!

name: Alend
text:
We were involved in a Christmas event
in a temporary city on a planet called Repcar III.

name: Alend
text:
Together with the three of us here, Mokdai,
and one other "Black Santa".

name: Astar
text:
Black Santa, huh.
One aspect of the elements that constitute "Santa",
which has been broadly interpreted and given a different name.

name: Astar
text:
Someone who only takes on the role of punishment
is interesting. I'd really like to hear
what they think about "Santa".

options.text: He's a twisted Santa, after all.
It might turn out to be a surprisingly meaningful exchange of opinions.

text:
After the conversation with Astar and the others settled down,
[Player] decided to go check on the other heroes.

And [Player] saw Kiloc and his child,
holding fishing rods,
walking along the shoreline.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Kiloc
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Well, that's the one!
I heard we had some free time, so.
I thought I'd try out my tackle while scouting!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Kiloc
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Well, that's the one!
I heard we had some free time, so.
I thought I'd try out my tackle while scouting!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Joezen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player]-san!?
Why are you tearing up!?
Kiloc placed a hand on Joezen's shoulder, who looked a bit surprised, and then opened his mouth again.

name: Kiloc
text:
I researched various things before coming to Japan,
and brought some tackle!
Right, Joezen!

name: Joezen
text:
Wait a second, Captain!
It sounds like you accepted the request
just to play around!

Joezen, smiled at by Kiloc,
tried to explain himself, his eyes darting around slightly.

name: Joezen
text:
I-I thought I'd refrain at first, you know?
But, when I asked Saotome-san,
he readily agreed, so I just...

name: Yohack
text:
You don't have to worry about it, I think!
Kiloc-san, Joezen-kun.

name: Yohack
text:
Saotome-san seems to want
pictures of heroes enjoying themselves!

Joezen, hearing Yohack's voice,
smiled happily and ran over.

name: Joezen
text:
Yohack-san!
I asked too much this time, but
thank you so much!

name: Kiloc
text:
Thank you for going ahead to Enoshima
in our place, it really helped!

name: Kiloc
text:
Ah, even as a captain, it's quite tough
to leave the ship for a while, you know.

name: Joezen
text:
While we were away from Estevolta,
there were tons of things to prepare,
like route planning and navigation instructions.

name: Kiloc
text:
We managed to adjust the schedule,
thanks to Yohack,
and I'm not putting it lightly!

name: Yohack
text:
No, no!
If I could be of help to you two,
I'm happy too!

name: Yohack
text:
Besides, Joezen-kun said
he wanted to see outside Estevolta IV—

name: Yohack
text:
I've always thought
I wanted to make that come true someday!

name: Joezen
text:
Yohack-san...!
I, really don't know what to say to that...!

The sunlight on the beach shone brightly
on the Estevolta heroes,
who were exchanging words of gratitude.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I was a bit worried if it suited me,
so I'm happy to hear you say that!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack
dialogue_after_selection.text:
This type is cool because the wind passes through,
and it's easy to move in, so it's good!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack
dialogue_after_selection.text:
After the photoshoot,
[Player]-san, let's change and
play together!

options.text: Kiloc, a fishing rod still suits you best!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Kiloc
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Of course!
I'm known as Master Fisherman Kiloc in Estevolta, you know!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Kiloc
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player]-chan, if you are alright with it, why don't you try fishing?
I'll teach you how!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Kiloc
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Of course,
I'll teach you every step of the way!

options.text: Joezen-kun, your angler look is nice too!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Joezen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ehehe!
This fishing rod was picked out for me
by Captain and Isaribi-san!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Joezen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'll show you, [Player]-san,
how much I've improved since then!

text:
As [Player] walked, talking with the heroes,
they encountered Saotome and the others
holding cameras.

name: Saotome
text:
Oh, [Player]-kun!
You were surprised by everyone's swimsuits, right?
It was quite a nice surprise, wasn't it?

name: Saotome
text:
Wahahaha!
Since they're swimsuits,
I wanted to show them off at the beach!

Perhaps satisfied with [Player]'s reaction,
Saotome laughed cheerfully and continued talking.

name: Saotome
text:
Good news, [Player]-kun!
Thanks to you, we've already taken many
good photos!

name: Saotome
text:
If we proceed with the project like this,
we'll definitely be able to make a wonderful swimsuit calendar!

name: Shiratori
text:
Of course, the event preparations,
and thanks to [Player]-san's connections,
things are progressing smoothly so far.

name: Saotome
text:
I feel like the heroes
look even better when they're with you, [Player]-kun!

name: Saotome
text:
I'll say it as many times as it takes,
I'm truly glad
we had [Player]-kun come!

note:
Cool Biz: a summer dress code campaign initiated in mid-2005
for the Japanese government, which then spread to private sectors

options.text: Your shirt looks great too, Saotome-san!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Wahahaha!
Well, it's kind of like Cool Biz!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I thought it might be difficult for the heroes
if the one taking pictures was dressed in hot clothes!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shiratori
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Saotome-san gets hot easily,
so I think he just wanted to wear less.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shiratori
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No...
You too, [Player]-san, you're truly working hard.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shiratori
dialogue_after_selection.text: I'm just preparing the equipment, so I don't think my contribution is enough to be commended...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text:
What are you saying, Shiratori-kun!
You yourself have been a great help too!

text:
As they captured the heroes'
interactions on camera,
a gentle time flowed by.

And, the calendar production
moved to the next stage—

Chapter 3:
Swimsuit-Clad Hero Live!

name: Saotome
text:
Heroes, everyone!
From now on, to include their figures
enjoying sports in the calendar...

name: Saotome
text:
You'll be boldly challenging
Enoshima's proud marine sports!

Saotome called for the heroes,
who were enjoying Enoshima Beach
in their own ways.

Behind Saotome, who was acting as the MC,
Shiratori was holding a camera.

The calendar production, which is the biggest supporter reward
in the crowdfunding project.
And being streamed in parallel with that is—

"Heroes' Beach Live!"
It's about delivering moments at Enoshima Beach
in a variety show style.

name: Saotome
text:
What the local heroes
will be challenging is—

name: Saotome
text: —This!

Where Saotome pointed,
several small jet skis
were prepared.

And, a short distance away,
a somewhat worn surfboard and
a set of paddles were lined up.

name: Saotome
text:
We took a survey from supporters about
who they wanted to do which sport!
To read a few of them—

name: Saotome
text:
"I'm a big fan of Alend-san!
I want to see the powerful Alend-san
surfing!"

name: Saotome
text:
"Just last month, Joezen-kun helped me
with a jet ski!
I want to see that cool figure again~!"

name: Saotome
text:
—And so on,
we've received many voices!

name: Saotome
text:
It's a shame I can't introduce all of them, but
I'll announce the crucial assignments!

name: Saotome
text:
Astar-kun, Kiloc-kun,
and Alend-kun will be doing
paddle surfing!

name: Kiloc
text:
Alright, leave it to me!
I'm an expert in all kinds of sea play,
riding waves is child's play for me!

name: Alend
text:
...Due to my profession,
I'm confident in my balance.
I should be able to handle it without a problem.

name: Astar
text:
I see.
I'm surfing, huh...

options.text: Is this perhaps your first time...?

name: Astar
text:
No, don't worry.
I've acquired all the skills necessary for "Santa".

name: Astar
text:
Because I've been training with the possibility
of someday performing as a "summer Santa"
in mind.

options.text: You were preparing for that too, huh?

text:
And in the other area, the designated hero
was already enthusiastically getting on a jet ski.

name: Joezen
text:
Leave jet skiing to me!
I've ridden it many times to rescue people
who fell from the ship!

name: Senthak
text:
These kinds of vehicles were surprisingly useful
during my mercenary days!
I'm quite confident in my skills!

And Yohack was checking some information
on a built-in device.

options.text: Huh, what are you reading right now...?

name: Yohack
text:
No need to worry,
[Player]-san!

name: Yohack
text:
I've never driven one myself, but
I've been a passenger before...

name: Yohack
text:
And I just read the manual,
so I completely understand it!
It'll probably be fine!

options.text: If you read the manual, you'll be OK!

name: Joezen
text:
Well then,
shall we start too!

name: Senthak
text:
Alright, Joezen-kun!
I'll show you my driving skills
honed in the field!

Following Joezen and Senthak,
who launched their jet skis with fluid movements—

name: Yohack
text:
I'm going too—!
Um, this here, like this—

name: Yohack
text:
—Huh? Oh no!?
Whoa—!?

name: Kiloc
text:
Whoa!
That was a bit of a scare, but—

name: Kiloc
text:
The waves of Earth's sea are
different from Estevolta IV's...
This is interesting!

name: Alend
text:
Hmph, I've pretty much got the hang of it.
The sensation of controlling the board with this paddle
is quite intriguing.

name: Alend
text:
It seems [Player] was worried about him earlier,
but Astar is doing well too.

name: Astar
text:
—Of course.
If I couldn't overcome waves like these,
I wouldn't be worthy of being a "summer Santa".

name: Viewer's Voice
text:
That muscular person is so cool~!
I wonder which hero they are?

name: Viewer's Voice
text:
Ohh~!
Paddle surfing, huh,
it looks quite interesting~!

name: Viewer's Voice
text:
To be able to see heroes in swimsuits...!
I'm glad I supported the crowdfunding~!

name: Viewer's Voice
text:
A one-of-a-kind and number-one design
that highlights each individual's strengths.
It's truly superb...!

The number of viewers for the heroes' surfing figures
was skyrocketing.

And, in a slightly distant area,
the heroes enjoying jet skiing
were also livening up the stream.

name: Senthak
text:
You're good, Joezen-kun!
To be able to keep up with my driving skills
honed in the field!

name: Joezen
text:
You too, Senthak-san!
I was confident in my driving, but
it seems there's still room for improvement!

name: Senthak
text:
Yohack-kun also looked a bit in danger at first,
but he seems to have improved quite a lot!

name: Joezen
text:
Yohack-san is a very dexterous person!
It's amazing how he's already mastered it!

name: Yohack
text:
Thanks to you two teaching me the tricks,
I'm gradually understanding how to ride it!

name: Yohack
text:
Cutting through the wind like this
makes my body feel light,
it's incredibly refreshing!

name: Viewer's Voice
text:
Everyone's driving so well~!
If it's not that difficult,
I might want to try it too...!

name: Viewer's Voice
text:
Hero suits are cool, but
swimsuits are fresh and cute~

name: Viewer's Voice
text:
Enoshima Beach, huh...
It seems there aren't many people around,
it looks pretty good!

name: Viewer's Voice
text:
It could be a candidate for a vacation spot.
That is, if this live stream doesn't cause
a flood of tourists.

The sight of heroes enjoying Enoshima's beach
was generating an unprecedented number of viewers
for Enoshima.

And, perhaps drawn by the excitement,
Enoshima islanders were also
gathering at the beach.

name: Islander
text:
I've never seen so many viewers!
Is this what hero popularity is about!?

name: Islander
text:
I hope that watching this stream,
even one more person will come visit Enoshima...!

Sufficient viewership numbers were already achieved.
However, to solidify them, Saotome announced
a final, decisive plan.

name: Saotome
text:
Today's final program is
a beach battle show by local heroes—

name: Saotome
text: Heroes' Beach Flag!

options.text: It's easy to understand, that's good!

name: Shiratori
text:
(...He apparently decided on this content
after consulting with his son.)

name: Shiratori
text:
(While proceeding with calendar production,
and delivering supporter rewards,
it also serves as PR for Enoshima...)

name: Shiratori
text:
(He said it was a triple-win plan, but
I wonder if it will go well...)

Saotome continued to MC,
unaware of Shiratori's anxiety,
who was in charge of filming.

name: Saotome
text:
"Swimsuits are good, but
we also want to see hero suits in action!"
—There were many voices from supporters saying that!

name: Saotome
text:
And the rules are simple and clear!
The hero who gets the flag first wins!
Of course, using Parallel Weapons is also OK!

name: Viewer's Voice
text:
When it comes to heroes,
it's got to be battle live!

name: Viewer's Voice
text:
Beach flag!?
What kind of techniques will they show!?

name: Viewer's Voice
text:
This match...!
I have a feeling it's going to be eventful!

As Saotome intended,
the viewers were greatly excited by the different
turn of events.

However, from the Enoshima children
who came to watch,
voices filled with dissatisfaction arose.

name: Island Kid
text:
If they're going to do a hero show,
I wanted to see Enoshiman too.

name: Island Kid
text:
A confrontation between Enoshiman
and the local heroes,
I'm sure it would be super exciting...

options.text: I understand how you feel, but...

name: Island Kid
text:
Enoshiman...
I guess he's not coming today after all.

—Hah-hah-hah!
I've been waiting for that call!!

name: Yohack
text: Th-That voice!

A loud laugh
echoed across Enoshima's beach.

When [Player] instinctively
looked towards Shiratori,
he was no longer there.

Instead of Shiratori,
a drone camera floated in the air,
continuing the stream.

options.text: (His voice is completely different from usual!)

name: Enoshiman
text:
I—
the local hero Enoshiman—
will not betray the children's expectations!

name: Island Kid
text:
Enoshiman!
You really came!

name: Island Kid
text:
Yay!
Now we can see a battle
between local heroes!

With Enoshiman's appearance,
the excited children swarmed Saotome.

name: Island Kid
text:
Hey, hey, Sa-chan!
We want to see a team with [Player]-san
as the commander!

name: Saotome
text:
Whoa!?
W-Wait a minute!?

name: Saotome
text:
I understand everyone's feelings, but
this development is definitely unexpected.
Wh-What should I do...?

name: Saotome's Son
text:
No, Dad!
This is a chance!

name: Saotome's Son
text:
Let's stream the battle between many local heroes
and Enoshiman,
and let everyone know about Enoshima!

name: Saotome
text:
Yuto, even you are on camera!
You say that, but...!

name: Saotome
text:
If we make a team of Astar-kun, Yohack-kun,
and Enoshiman, the number of heroes won't match...!

name: Enoshiman
text:
Hah-hah-hah!
Yuto-kun says good things!
...In that case, I have an idea!

name: Enoshiman
text:
Let's split into two teams and compete!
I'll team up with Yohack-kun, Astar-kun, and
[Player]-kun!

name: Enoshiman
text:
Although our team has fewer heroes,
the four of us have a track record of defeating
monsters together under [Player]-kun's command!

name: Enoshiman
text:
Even if Joezen-kun and the others,
four heroes, are our opponents,
I'm sure we can have a good match!

options.text: Isn't this already a broadcast accident!?

name: Kiloc
text:
Oh, he just barged in and started taking charge!
He's an interesting guy, I like him!
I'll accept that challenge!

name: Joezen
text:
Why are you so enthusiastic, Captain!?
It's too sudden, there's no room to even interject...!

Everyone's eyes widened at Enoshiman's appearance,
but the viewers' reactions were surprisingly positive.

name: Viewer's Voice
text:
Enoshima's local hero, huh!
This looks like it's going to be a fresh battle!

name: Viewer's Voice
text:
Team beach flag!?
What kind of battle will it be...!?

name: Alend
text:
...I see.
If the viewers desire this situation,
we should meet their expectations.

name: Senthak
text:
Hehe, I welcome a surprise like this!
Let's go all out, Alend-kun!!

name: Astar
text:
The ability to improvise and respond flexibly
to unexpected situations that arise one after another.
And, what you might call fan service.

name: Astar
text:
...Is this a hero's job?
It seems I have to revise
my previous understanding.

name: Astar
text:
To think the required abilities
are so diverse.

name: Yohack
text:
It's okay, Astar-san!
Honestly, I have no idea
what's going on either!

name: Yohack
text:
For now, let's just trust [Player]-san's
operation and do our best!
Enoshiman-san is here too!

options.text: It feels like everything's being dumped on my head...

name: Enoshiman
text:
—It seems the discussion is settled!
Well then, Astar-kun, Yohack-kun!
And [Player]-kun!!

name: Enoshiman
text:
I—
Enoshiman—
will seize the flag of victory with you!
Battle Start

name: Joezen
text:
I apologize, but I'll have to
stop you with my Parallel Weapon!

name: Senthak
text:
Joezen-kun, I'll join in too!
Parallel Weapon, deploy!

The sandstorm raised by Joezen and
the 3D hologram thrown by Senthak
obstructed Astar and the others' progress.

name: Enoshiman
text:
As expected of a seasoned local hero,
that's a truly splendid attack!
At this rate, we can't do anything!

name: Astar
text:
You, is this the time to be impressed!?
At this rate, they'll take the flag!

Beyond the sandstorm,
Alend and Kiloc had already
started running towards the flag.

Moving walkways were installed
beneath their feet, and they were rapidly
approaching the flag.

options.text: This isn't what beach flag is supposed to be like...

name: Yohack
text:
[Player]-san!
Please give me ViewPower!

name: Yohack
text:
Astar-san and Enoshiman-san,
I'll send them off!

name: Yohack
text:
Astar-san, Enoshiman-san!
Receive my power!
Hmph!

The heroes, whose potential was drawn out by Yohack's Parallel Weapon,
started running fiercely, unfazed by the headwind.

name: Saotome
text:
Ohh!?
Astar-kun and Enoshiman
have broken through the sandstorm!

name: Alend
text:
Incredible speed!
At this rate, they'll catch up!

name: Kiloc
text:
This is probably
Yohack's doing!
But how about this!

Kiloc wound up greatly,
then threw an anchor
towards Astar and the others.

name: Enoshiman
text:
I see...!
A precise judgment, but—!

name: Enoshiman
text:
Astar-kun,
leave this to me!

Enoshiman caught the flying anchor head-on,
then pulled the chain back.

name: Kiloc
text:
Enoshiman, was it!?
To catch my anchor, you're pretty good...!

name: Kiloc
text:
In that case,
I'll go stop him!
I'm counting on you, Alend!

name: Alend
text:
Hey, Kiloc!?
Seriously, you're asking for something unreasonable
without any prior discussion.

name: Viewer's Voice
text:
Alend-san and
Astar-san's one-on-one battle!

name: Viewer's Voice
text:
The speed of the two is almost equal!
Who will win this match!?

Astar and Alend
reached the flag almost simultaneously.
Both plunged into the beach, raising a cloud of sand.
And, the one holding the flag was—

The anything-goes beach flag battle
by local heroes ended with great excitement.

The heroes' joyful appearance
garnered an unrealistic number of viewers
for Enoshima, compared to before.

And the moment the stream ended,
the children who had come to watch
rushed towards the heroes.

name: Island Kid
text:
You're a hero too, big brother!
You're amazing even though
you're not much different from me!

name: Joezen
text:
Eh, ehh!?
Really...!?
I'm amazing... hehe...

name: Joezen
text:
A-Ahem.
It's not that great, but
thank you for cheering for me!

name: Islander
text:
Your fighting figure with holograms
was very cool!
You've become my favorite!

name: Senthak
text:
O-Oh, I'm the one being supported, huh!?
Of course I'm happy, but
I'm a little embarrassed...!

[Player]'s team's heroes
returned while receiving praise from the children.

options.text: That was an amazing sprint, Astar!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That level of athletic performance is natural for "Santa".
However, they were formidable opponents too.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack
dialogue_after_selection.text: I, too, was able to move easily thanks to your command, [Player]-san!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack
dialogue_after_selection.text: It was quite a sudden development and I was a bit confused, so getting instructions was a huge help!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Enoshiman
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hah-hah-hah!
I asked for something unreasonable, but I was confident you could handle it!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Enoshiman
dialogue_after_selection.text: And of course, it's also thanks to the wonderful heroes Astar-kun and Yohack-kun!

name: Astar
text:
It would have been difficult without their help.
I thank you. Yohack, Enoshiman.
And [Player] too.

name: Yohack
text:
In other words, it was a team victory!
I wondered how it would turn out at first,
but I'm relieved that I could be of help!

name: Enoshiman
text:
Hah-hah-hah!
It was an honor to fight alongside
such splendid heroes again!

name: Enoshiman
text:
—Well then,
let's meet again when someone calls me!

Enoshiman, having declared that,
disappeared into the forest behind the beach
with incredible speed.

options.text: Well then, time to transform back.

text:
And, children gathered again
around Yohack and Astar,
who remained on the spot.

name: Saotome's Son
text:
Thank you for helping Enoshiman!
Yohack-san!

name: Island Kid
text:
That was an amazing technique, right!
I want that key too~!

name: Yohack
text:
Everyone in Enoshima,
thank you for cheering us on!
Thanks to that, I could do my best~!

name: Island Kid
text:
Yohack-kun~!
Let's play together next time!
We'll teach you how to ride!

name: Yohack
text:
In that case, maybe I'll have everyone
teach me the tricks!

name: Island Kid
text:
Astar-oniichan!
You run incredibly fast!

name: Island Kid
text:
You're good at surfing too, and
you're so muscular and cool~!

name: Astar
text: I-Is that so?

name: Astar
text:
...Ahem.
The body is capital for work, after all.
I make sure not to neglect my training.

name: Saotome's Son
text:
Astar-san is
a hardworking Santa!

name: Island Kid
text:
...Sorry for saying you looked weird.
Both your Santa outfit and your surfing outfit
were incredibly cool!

name: Astar
text:
...I-I see.
Ah, thank you.

To avoid disturbing the heroes and children,
who had completely warmed up to each other,
[Player] walked a little further away.

name: Shiratori
text:
Good work, [Player]-san.
That being said, I'm sorry as well.
For suddenly putting you on the spot...

From the forest at the back of the beach,
Shiratori appeared, offering words
of apology.

In stark contrast to his earlier performance (as Enoshiman),
he exuded a gloomy fatigue
from his entire body.

options.text: You look a bit worn out!?
Shiratori-san, it seems that you had it tough...

name: Shiratori
text:
D-Don't worry about it.
It's always like this
after transforming (as Enoshiman).

name: Shiratori
text:
Because I'm forcing out a high tension
that I don't originally possess...

name: Shiratori
text:
It's like a recoil, or rather,
a backlash occurs,
and I just get completely exhausted.

Saying that,
Shiratori, who smiled weakly,
muttered softly.

name: Shiratori
text:
...This was
good, right?

name: Shiratori
text:
I think this is the first time
so many people have paid attention
to Enoshima.

name: Shiratori
text:
If we can gather this much attention,
the number of people visiting Enoshima will gradually increase,
and it should become easier for everyone on the island to live.

name: Shiratori
text:
This is also thanks to [Player]-san
and the heroes.
Thank you very much, truly.

name: Shiratori
text: However...

name: Saotome
text:
—Shiratori-kun!
[Player]-kun!

Saotome's voice echoed,
as if to interrupt Shiratori's words.

name: Saotome
text:
What are you doing in this corner?
It was quite hard to find you.

name: Saotome
text:
Wahahaha!
Due to my job, I'm used to that kind of role!
It looked pretty good, didn't it?

name: Saotome
text:
No, no!
You too, [Player]-kun,
good work!

name: Saotome
text:
The photoshoot became full of improvisation,
but you handled it skillfully,
which was a huge help!

name: Saotome
text:
—Anyway, Shiratori-kun.
Were you about to say something?

name: Shiratori
text:
No, it's nothing important
enough to rephrase, but...

Shiratori, who hesitated, nodded slightly
and, following Saotome's urging to continue,
opened his mouth again.

name: Shiratori
text:
...Enoshima has never gathered
this much approval before.
At least, not in my memory.

name: Shiratori
text:
I hope this excitement
doesn't provoke the monsters...

Receiving Shiratori's words,
a moment of silence fell upon the place.
And then—

name: Saotome
text:
—Right.
I understand your concerns, Shiratori-kun.

name: Saotome
text:
Given Enoshima's local characteristics,
history proves that monsters tend to appear
a little more often.

name: Saotome
text:
However, with so many heroes
and our Enoshiman here,
I'm sure we'll be fine no matter what monster appears!

Saotome's cheerful voice
faded into the sound of waves washing ashore.
